<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE3231</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Weekly Book Tasks</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wöchentliche Buch-Aufgaben</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Livre Hebdomadaire Charge</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Tarefas Semanais Do Livro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mansioni Settimanali Del Libro</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εβδομαδιαίες στοιχειώδεις εργασίες βιβλίων</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Tareas Semanales Del Libro</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Instructions for students to carry out a series of six weekly book assignements which relate to different aspects such as characterization and plot.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">English</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">literature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">book reports</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">reading</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anweisungen, damit Kursteilnehmer eine Reihe von 
sechs wöchentlichen Buch assignements durchführen, die auf 
unterschiedlichen Aspekten wie Kennzeichnung in Verbindung stehen und 
plotten.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Instructions pour que les étudiants effectuent 
une série de six assignements hebdomadaires de livre qui associent à
différents aspects tels que la caractérisation et tracent.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Instruções para que os estudantes realizem uma 
série de seis assignements semanais do livro que se relacionam aos 
aspectos diferentes tais como a caracterização e se traçam.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Istruzioni affinchè allievi effettuino una serie
di sei assignements settimanali del libro che si riferiscono alle 
funzioni differenti quale la descrizione e tracciano.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οδηγίες για τους σπουδαστές για να πραγματοποιήσουν μια
σειρά έξι εβδομαδιαίων assignements βιβλίων που αφορούν τις 
διαφορετικές πτυχές όπως ο χαρακτηρισμός και η πλοκή.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Instrucciones para que estudiantes realicen una 
serie de seis assignements semanales del libro que se relacionan con 
diversos aspectos tales como caracterización y trazan.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Englisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Literatur</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Buchreports</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messwert</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Anglais</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">littérature</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">états de livre</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">lecture</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Inglês</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">literatura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">relatórios do livro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">leitura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Inglese</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">letteratura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">rapporti del libro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">lettura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αγγλικά</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">λογοτεχνία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">informes del libro</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
        </general>
